topics.body:
So, I just saw "The Last Stand"
Is it any good? Well;
Arnold Schwarzenegger [spoiler]tackles a guy off a roof, shoots him in the head freefall and then falls through several floors using his body as a shield.[/spoiler]

Now that, would have been a Rules of Nature moment.
topics.author: 515ddf93a4c72d8a1f000d57

topics.body:
Oh, and there is part where [spoiler]Johnny Knoxville shoots a flare gun at a guy with a ballistic vest, blowing him into pieces.[/spoiler]

This movie man. This goddamn movie.
